description: To create an ARCHIVER file, drag and drop your audio or image file into the application. You can also select File â†’ Open... , navigate to your file, and click Open . After you open your file, select "Create Archive," choose "Archiver," specify your settings, and click "Finish."
To open an ARCHIVER file, double-click the file and select "Extract." From here, you can open the file or export your file or export it.
